metadata.title: Jade Facial Roller, jade massager roller jade stone roller for face neck eyes body healing
features: ❅【FREE YOUR BEAUTY】-Reduces your dark circles and puffiness under the eyes,promote blood circulation to the eye area,our jade facial roller can wake up your skin everyday.After a few days, you will notice some significant changes on your skin.

❅【MORE FUNCTION】-This jade facial roller also have function on improving blood circulation and skin tone,improve elasticity of the skin,promote lymphatic drainage,relax your stress and muscle ache,like your private masseur.

❅【REINFORCED &PORTABLE】- We have fixed the contact surfaces of handle and stainless steel tightly,it is durable enough and not easy to fall apart.The jade stone roller is stored perfectly in the lovely bag so that you can bring it to any where you want to go.
❅【NATURAL JADE】-Our jade massager roller adopts natural mineral stone,which is durable and decent quality.Sleek surface gives you a smooth,comfortable and gentle touch feeling,won't hurt your skin.

❅【100% CUSTOMER’S SATISFACTION】-Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns about our jade roller before or after your purchase. We will try our best to help you solve the problems.
description: This double-edged pure Jade roller device was created specifically to help reduce fine line,minimize pores, and tighten the skin to give you a bright youthful glow. It also assists the lymphatic system by helping drain lymphatic fluids and toxins.

- Double-head design: It has smooth small and big rollers that were specifically designed to easily glide on all areas of the face, including hard to reach sensitive areas around the eyes, while providing a soothing effect. - Natural jade: The natural jade massager roller will give you the best results to promote healthy and beautiful looking skin. - Relaxing: Used our jade stone roller to relax your skin after a long time work. - Absorb better: After you apply the moisturizer on your skin,it would be absorb better to use our jade massager roller to roll on your skin.

1. Wash your face with your normal cleansing products. Dry your face completely with a towel. 2. Apply any night creams to your face and neck. 3. Use upward motions to move the jade massager roller gently over your forehead,cheeks,around the lip area and your neck.Close your eyes and roll gently over your eyelids if you have puffy eyes or bags under your eyes. 4. Use the roller on your face and neck for 5 to 10 minutes. 5. Use the jade stone roller three times a week to reduce lines and wrinkles.

- Item might has a slight difference in color, Vein and Lines for jade is a natural material. - Please take great care when handling the jade massager roller. The jade stone roller is handmade and delicate; we recommend using gentle pressure as skin is also delicate. - Jade is movable and flexible to massage, if jade out of holder ,try to install it back.
Please feel free to contact us,best wishes!
